attributes.action: Ask MPs to vote to dissolve Parliament and move to a General Election.
attributes.additional_details: We did not vote for the current administration, its policies, or chaos. It is amazing that we have just 70,000 people that chose the current Prime Minister. This is not democracy. And we are reaping the consequences. It is not acceptable. Give the British public a General Election immediately.
attributes.background: I would like you to debate the dissolution of Parliament and give the British public a General Election vote.
